Minhas finanças
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-toolbar", templateUrl: "./toolbar.component.html", styleUrls: ["./toolbar.component.scss"], }) export class ToolbarComponent { // lista de menus menu: any[] = [ { title: "Dashboard", icon: "dashboard", router: "dashboard" }, { title: "Categorias", icon: "category", router: "categorias" }, { title: "Entradas", icon: "login", router: "entradas" }, ]; }
